short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for a word selected on a website in English dictionaries. German-English, French-English, Latin-English, ...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Highlight the unknown word on the page.
2. Right-click on the highlighted word (to bring up the context menu).
3. Left-click on the "Search in DictZone ... dictionary for ..." option in the menu that corresponds to your search.

You can select the dictionaries to use for your search in the settings.
